LanguageData.RK_Dagger.label: Ratkin dagger
LanguageData.RK_Dagger.description: A cute little dagger good for quick stabbing attacks. Its handle is too small for a human to wield properly.

LanguageData.RK_Dagger.tools.1.label: edge

LanguageData.RK_OneHanded.description: A sword perfectly balanced for single-handed use. Its handle is too small for a human to wield properly.

LanguageData.RK_OneHanded.tools.1.label: edge

LanguageData.RK_LightLance.label: Ratkin wooden lance
LanguageData.RK_LightLance.description: A wooden lance reinforced with steel rings to increase its destructive power. Due to its weight, untrained users will struggle to strike targets accurately with it. Its handle is too small for a human to wield properly.

LanguageData.RK_LightLance.tools.1.label: point

LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.label: Ratkin two-handed sword
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.description: A long and heavy sword that requires both hands to wield, but if used properly, can literally split an enemy in two.
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_TwoHanded.tools.1.label: point

LanguageData.RK_HeavyLance.label: Ratkin heavy lance
LanguageData.RK_HeavyLance.description: A large, heavy metal lance. Due to its increased weight, it can reliably pierce most grades of armor, but untrained users will struggle to strike targets accurately with it. Its handle is too small for a human to wield properly.
